title: RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module > RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module > RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module Documentation and Resources

title: RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module > RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module > Product Description > RAK12002 Real-Time Clock Module Overview
content: The RAK12002 is a Real-Time Clock module, part of the RAKwireless WisBlock Series, designed to provide real-time clock capabilities to your WisBlock projects. The RTC chip is based on the RV-3028-C7 from Micro Crystal and uses the I2C interface.
parent_content: The RAK12002 is a Real-Time Clock module, part of the RAKwireless WisBlock Series, designed to provide real-time clock capabilities to your WisBlock projects. The RTC chip is based on the RV-3028-C7 from Micro Crystal and uses the I2C interface.

title: RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module > RAK12002 WisBlock RTC Module > Prerequisites > RAK12002 Module Requirements and Setup
content:
To use a **RAK12002**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** is the power supply for the **RAK12002** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the module.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12002**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** is the power supply for the **RAK12002** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the module.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
